subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, July 8 (AP) — David Ortiz hit his 31st home run, Josh Beckett recorded his 11th victory despite giving up three homers and the Boston Red Sox received clutch two-out hits in the sixth and seventh inning Saturday to defeat the Chicago White Sox, 9-6.
